texts.text: Patch 30 was a version of Wii U Edition released on December 19, 2017.[1] [edit]

1 Additions
1.1 Items
1.2 Mobs
1.3 Non-mob entities
1.4 World generation
1.5 General
2 Changes
2.1 Blocks
2.2 Items
2.3 Mobs
2.4 Non-mob entities
2.5 World generation
3 Fixes
4 See also
5 References

Added fallen, dying and vined trees.
Dying and vined trees can be grown with saplings.

Added Norse Mythology Mashup Pack.
Added Festive Tumble Arena.
Shrubs now have a different texture.

Cauldrons can be filled with potions.
Effects can now be applied to arrows by using them on a potion-filled cauldron.
Water can be dyed.
Armor can be dyed in a Cauldron filled with dyed water.
Can no longer be pushed by pistons.
Spawn eggs can now stack up to 64.
Baby zombie jockeys can now ride any mobs.

Explodes and spawns Wither Skeletons on half health.
Change to dash attack.
Remove health regeneration.
New birth and death animations.
Now have arms and multiple poses.
Can now travel through transparent blocks.
Stronghold chests can now generate emeralds.

Tables have brown carpet instead of a pressure plate.
Added Ice Plains & Cold Taiga Villages.
Added Chests to Ice Plains and Cold Taiga Villages.
Ice Plains & Cold Taiga Villages won't generate crops.
Paths around village wells now made up of grass path (sandstone in desert).

Fireworks will now fire in the direction the dispenser is facing.
Mob heads will now drop to ground unless they are being placed on a block that would cause a wither or snow golem to spawn.

MCCE-4030 – Endermen do not make any noise
MCCE-5458 – Achievments
MCCE-5765 – The vertical and horizontal bud do not work with oven, dispenser, dropper.
MCCE-5817 – Observers are broken
MCCE-6516 – Super Mario Mash Up World's TNT player launchers/cannons and slime block piston player launcher are broken
MCCE-6613 – PS4 Norse Mythology Pack is bugged
MCCE-6615 – Observers do not detect extending pistons
MCCE-6641 – "Saddle Up" trophy bug
MCCE-6649 – Acceptance screen appears on every restart.

Xbox 360 Edition TU60
Xbox One Edition CU51
PlayStation 3 Edition 1.64
PlayStation 4 Edition 1.64
PlayStation Vita Edition 1.64
Nintendo Switch Edition 1.0.11
"Minecraft: Wii U Edition Patch change logs" – Minecraft Forum, December 19, 2017.
